user.title: Set up GitOps
user.description:
Enter a Doppler service token scoped to your project and config for secrets access.

The integration will poll Git for new commits and show them as available updates.

deploy.name: Deploy
deploy.description: Pull latest configuration from Git, sync secrets, validate, and reload changed components.

check_updates.name: Check for updates
check_updates.description: Fetch from Git remote and check for available commits.

git_lock_detected.title: Git Lock File Detected
git_lock_detected.description:
A git lock file was detected at `.git/index.lock`. Remove it to resume deployments:
```bash
rm /config/.git/index.lock
```

restart_required.title: Home Assistant Restart Required
restart_required.description:
Commit `{commit}` deployed, but changes require a restart.

{message}

doppler_connection_failed.title: Doppler Connection Failed
doppler_connection_failed.description:
Failed to connect to Doppler: {error}

Secrets sync is disabled until restored.

deployment_interrupted.title: Previous Deployment Interrupted
deployment_interrupted.description: A deployment started at {timestamp} (commit: {commit}) did not complete.

integration_needs_reload.title: GitOps Integration Updated
integration_needs_reload.description: Updated from {old_version} to {new_version}. Reload via Settings → Devices & Services → GitOps.
